title: The 'Indrani' Heritage Haaram - A Symphony of Rose Quartz, Emeralds and Diamonds
materials: 22K Gold with Antique Hyderabadi Polish. Features cushion-cut Rose Quartz (clarity VVS)
and meticulously set Polki Diamonds. The pendant showcases a uniquely carved Aquamarine gemstone.
features: This 'Indrani' Haaram seamlessly blends tradition and contemporary aesthetics. The design incorporates a classic leaf pattern with emeralds and polki diamonds. The focal point is a large, intricately carved Aquamarine pendant, surrounded by a delicate filigree of gold and diamonds. Rose Quartz stones add a touch of modern elegance and balance.
colors: The overall color palette is a beautiful blend of pastel pink (Rose Quartz)
and the warm glow of antique-finished gold. The diamonds add brilliant sparkle.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaha)
and other significant celebrations. Its unique design also makes it a statement piece for high-end galas and formal events.
description: This Haaram is a testament to exceptional craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The combination of traditional design elements with modern gemstone choices creates a truly unique piece. The carved Aquamarine pendant adds an artistic flair, making it a heirloom-worthy treasure. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster and durability. A true reflection of South Indian heritage with a contemporary touch.
